title: EPIC-008: Release Checklist & Runbook

epic.title: Deployment & Release Management
epic.goal: Define deployment workflow, rollback strategy, zero-downtime deployment, release checklist, runbooks for production operations

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Release checklist: version tag created, changelog updated, tests passing, migrations reviewed, secrets rotated (if needed)
Deployment runbook: step-by-step commands (kubectl apply, helm upgrade, etc.), health check validation, traffic switch
Rollback runbook: revert deployment (blue-green switch), revert migration (Alembic downgrade), validate rollback
Post-deployment validation: check /health, /metrics, logs for errors, smoke test (create dialog, send message)
Incident response: on-call rotation, alert escalation, debugging steps (check logs, metrics, DB queries)
Document in repo (docs/runbook.md), accessible to all engineers
description: Create release checklist and operational runbook: pre-deployment checks, deployment steps, post-deployment validation, rollback procedure, incident response.
